name: Fig's Promise
description:
Explore a cozy witch’s hut, uncover hidden ingredients and stories, and prepare potion recipes to make for graduation!

In the homey hut they’ve been training in since their youth, apprentice witch Fig has been taught for years by their ever-present, supportive mentor Aster. Coming up on their graduation to become a full-fledged witch, Fig must make their best potion yet in order to pass their final test and show they are ready to move on to leading their own practice in town. Let your curiosity lead you while you join Fig as they investigate Aster’s wide collection of oddities for clues, reminisce on their years of training and growing up, and brew various potions from the ingredients scattered about. 

This is a single player RPG game that uses keyboard and limited mouse controls, lasting around 20-40 minutes.

Though our game explores a more somber topic and theme, we hope it provides a space to reflect upon your own life and be touched by Fig’s journey. 

Content Warning: death, loss, and grief.
